reviews.review: First game that I played mainly for story

Been a a Half-Life fan for years. HL2 is on my top 5 favorite games. Just completed Black Mesa which is the HL1 (remastered) remake. Its a perfect part 2 of the HL series. Now all they need to do is get HL3 in the works.  :)

This game to be honest is one of the best Action, First-Person Shooter, Science-Fiction/Horror games I have ever played. I took my time over the years why I did not complete this game and then now going back to it again, I just want to say that this game is challenging with a very good story-line at the same time fun to play. Those gamers who have played this game knows or does not know that this game is quite difficult and you must be fully prepared and equipped to face and destroy enemies around you through out this game.

Unfortunately I am playing this game with cheats as it is very challenging against enemies at times and I keep having to use life health and refilling it but I am having fun and enjoying the story and the gameplay at the same time. Now you can be me playing with cheats or not be me as I have priorities in life but still playing this as I don't really care about perfecting this game.

Just wondering how long it has been since the game has been released long time ago, most of the gamers have enjoyed and played this. The developers should consider making a third sequel to this amazing game as I recommend it to every gamers and fans out there. 

"It is Truly a Masterpiece Classic of 2004"

Let's be honest, this was one of the best shooters ever made. Character animation, gameplay, even ambient storytelling are all at their peak in this game, which, unfortunately, we'll never see the conclusion to (screw you, Gaben).
I'm scanning your feet this a foot scanner HD we are gonna get high-res pics of your feet, bro Gordon Feetman!
Its fun, and the story is really interesting.
Its great. You can even play its maps when you link the game with Garry's Mod

I'm super surprised how well this game from 2004 holds up today. It looks great. The story and dialogue are fantastic. The gun play is so satisfying with a decent variety of weapons. Not to mention the gravity gun and all the other cool stuff you can do. I'm 5 hours in but pretty hooked, and excited to see where the story is going. I can see why this game is a classic.

EDIT: Ok, I finished the game. Now I understand all the hype and memes about Half-Life 3. 

I thought the length of the story was just right. The characters were likeable, and the story itself was really well done. As the game progresses, the battles get more tense. I loved the parts where all the characters are out in the streets fighting, like it's all been building to this moment.

One issue I did have was the AI of the followers. Frequently I was finding myself stuck in a room with them blocking my path, and I almost died a few times because they were in the way. 

Other than that, everything else in the game was perfect. 

The ending was just bonkers, and for Valve to leave people on that cliffhanger and never revisit it, is insane. 

"Time, Dr Freeman?" sent chills through me and I have no idea why. I just hope we see the continuation of this game.
Хорошая Игра И Продолжение Серии Халвы Прошел Игру Несколько Раз И Оба Эпизода На Ура

I don't think there is much more to say about Half-life 2 that it hasn't been said before , it is a good game with a solid story even after 16 years .
Even if there is a free version of it it is a must to have on your steam library and you should play it just for the gem that it is in the history of videogames . Because without Half-life 2 alot of games would not be what they are today .

노스텔지어의 하프라이프. 나의 어린시절 불법다운로드 사이트에서 아버지가 처음으로 받아주신 게임. 나의 인생의 첫 유료게임이었다. 어린나이에서부터 게임공략법을 좋아하던 내게 첫 콘솔치트를 맛보게 해준 게임. 빠루를 휘두르며 달리고,  드넓은 모래사장에서 포자를 주물럭거리며 개미들을 끌고다니던 것이 어느새 십여년전이다. 아직도 나의 추억을 회상할 수 있게해주는 변치않는게임. 옛날엔 처음 진행할떄 인터넷으로 공략법을 찾아보면서 했으나 성인이 된 후에 해보는 하프라이트는 사뭇 그때와 느낌이 달랐다. 단지 달리기만해도 스치는 바람결을 느낄수 있던 동심이 없어졌음을 느낄수 있었다. 쫒아오던 헬기가 귀찮기만 하고, 컴바인놈들은 쉽게 죽기만하고, 순수했던, 때묻지 않았던 나의 과거의 모습을 되돌아 볼 수 있게 해준 게임이었다. 벌써 16년이 지나버린 지금 이 게임은 인생게임이자 인생을 돌아보는 게임으로써 나의 추억속에 영원할 것이다.

One of the Best games I've ever played. Half-Life 2 sets so many seemingly unreachable goals, like creating an interesting story, an amazingly big world with amazing characters, unreal physics and graphics. And it does everything in this list and even more than that amazingly well. It actually surprises me, how this 2004 Game can be so much better, than even modern games, even from a technical perspective.
45 "Games of the Year" and "A game of the Decade" titles are not lying - this game is definitely a must-have. Most probably these ~20 hours of your life would be one of the most memorable experiences of your life =)

I know it probably says that I only have a few minutes or hours by the time you read this but I have played this game 3 times (including hl1 and episodes 1 and 2) when I didn't have my own steam account so I have a bit of play experiance.

So I love this game, it has a great story and it's one of the first games I ever played. It has a nice difficulty and while the graphics etc aren't quiet a match for todays games, source is still a great game engine.

So yea 10/10 did buy again.
Uno de los mejores FPS de todos los tiempos. Clásico obligado. Pese a los años, sigue teniendo una jugabilidad increíble.

La trilogie de half life  reste pour moi une meilleur expérience a revivre  je m'amuse  a rejouer a ce jeux avec tout les mod et les restauration d'arme que on pouvez pas jouer avant enfin si vous aimer les jeux de la vielle école  prenez half life  la ou vous passerais du bon temps.

Durée de vie importante, de la variété, de l'action et un peu de reflexion.

Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia, y es del 2004. Tan bueno como su primera entrega (junto con Black Mesa), todos los juegos de la saga HL son históricos y entretenidos.
